requirements.description: Replay corpus tests are deterministic and executed in CI
Every PR publishes parity subsystem deltas
Rust standalone gateway mode serves control-plane RPCs without TypeScript gateway runtime
Role/scope authorization matrix is enforced at request dispatch boundary
Event fanout applies bounded backpressure/drop semantics for slow consumers
Browser orchestration parity supports node proxy and browser.open flow with allowlist + timeout/error contracts
Canvas present flow supports waitable node invoke completion and cancellation semantics
Node/device command gate fixtures cover pairing, invoke/event, browser/canvas, and declared camera/screen/location/system command routes
Provider alias normalization parity for model references (for example z.ai -> zai, qwen -> qwen-portal)
Provider-model normalization supports codex and anthropic shorthand canonicalization
Baseline provider failover chain fixtures are executable and published as CI artifacts
Model patch parity clears persisted session auth-profile override state when model/provider changes
Runtime model selection executes provider fallback routing under auth-profile cooldown pressure
Rust CLI exposes doctor diagnostics command with non-interactive output for runbook compatibility
Control-plane update workflow continues to expose doctor follow-up hint in restart sentinel payloads
CP7 fixtures run in CI and publish gate artifacts
